descriptionHtml:
This is my rendition of Thor (from the movies played by Chris Hemsworth.) He is a one-handed follower that is also marriageable. He is sitting outside of the Barracks in Dawnstar.

Required Mods:
Apachii Male Hairstyles - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

Recommended mods to get screenshot looks:
Better Males - Nudes, Faces and Hairstyles - (No more blocky faces, Younger Faces merged with men, and underwear versions)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?

Thors hammer that is in the last screenshot:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6620/?

For Installation:
Drag and Drop the files into your Data folder. Typically, this folder is found:
C://Program Files/Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim/Data
author: Kaolinite77
